I: 125–126 1998 gọọmentị mere atụmatụ na enwere mmadụ 5,753,000 nwere nkwarụ na Japan, nke mejupụtara ihe dịka 4.8% nke ngụkọta ndị bi na ya
Ngụkọta nke otu atọ akọwapụtara n'ụzọ iwu bụ: 3,170,000 nwere nkwarụ;  413,000 nwere nkwarụ ọgụgụ isi; na 4,170,000 nwere nkwarụ uche

Ụdị nkwarụ ahụ bụ nke ndị nwere nsogbu ndị a: 1,657,000 (56.5%) mmeghari ngagharị;  305,000 (10.4%) na-ahụ anya;  350,000 (11.9%) nwere ike ịnụ ihe ma ọ bụ ntị chiri;  ebe 621,000 (21.2%) nwere "nkwarụ ime" dịka ọrịa obi.: 125-126
